entries.title: Jury clears Musk of wrongdoing in 2018 tweets
entries.description: The verdict was reached after less than two hours of deliberation.

entries.title: WATCH:  Husky unimpressed with his human baby brother
entries.description: Cash the Husky was not happy after his baby brother grabbed onto his tail and pulled.

entries.title: Jupiter's moon count jumps to 92, most in solar system
entries.description: Astronomers have discovered 12 new moons around Jupiter, putting the total count at a record-breaking 92

entries.title: Licenses suspended for 2 fired EMTs in Tyre Nichols death
entries.description: A Tennessee board has suspended the emergency medical technician licenses of two former Memphis Fire Department employees for failing to render critical care to slain Tyre Nichols who was beaten by police

entries.title: Woman mistakenly pronounced dead breathing in body bag at funeral home
entries.description: Employees at an Iowa medical care center mistakenly deemed a 66-year-old woman in hospice care dead and coordinated her transportation in a cloth bag to a funeral home.

entries.title: 2 in custody after 6 relatives, including baby, gunned down in 'massacre'
entries.description: Two suspects are in custody after six family members, including a 16-year-old mom and her baby, were gunned down in a targeted and likely gang-related "massacre."

entries.title: Maid's son tells judge Alex Murdaugh took $4M for her death
entries.description: Prosecutors at Alex Murdaugh’s double murder trial are asking a judge to allow jurors to hear from the son of the family's housekeeper who says Murdaugh promised to take care of them when she died in a fall, but kept a $4 million settlement for himself

entries.title: 3 bodies found in search for rappers who went missing last month
entries.description: Detroit police found the bodies of three men in the basement of an abandoned apartment complex as they searched for rappers Armani Kelly, Dante Wicker and Montoya Givens.

entries.title: Fashion designer Paco Rabanne has died at age 88
entries.description: Fashion designer Paco Rabanne has died at age 88. The designer was well known for his space-age aesthetic.

entries.title: California weighs making flag football a girls' school sport
entries.description: California officials are considering a plan to make flag football a girls’ high school sport amid soaring popularity of the game and a push to get more female athletes on the field

entries.title: Giant panda Le Le dies after 20 years at Memphis Zoo
entries.description: Memphis Zoo says giant panda Le Le has died

entries.title: Lauded fashion designer Paco Rabanne dies at age 88
entries.description: Spanish-born fashion designer Paco Rabanne has died at age 88

entries.title: NFL will offer free CPR training during Super Bowl week
entries.description: Inspired by the lifesaving medical attention Damar Hamlin received on the field during a game last month, the NFL and American Heart Association will provide free CPR education in Arizona throughout Super Bowl week as part the NFL Experience at the Pho...

entries.title: Shlomo Perel, Holocaust survivor, film subject, dies at 98
entries.description: Shlomo Perel, who survived the Holocaust through surreal subterfuge and an extraordinary odyssey that inspired his own writing and an internationally renowned film, has died

entries.title: US tells owners to park old Hondas until air bags are fixed
entries.description: Honda and the U.S. government are urging owners of about 8,200 older vehicles not to drive them until dangerous air bag inflators are replaced

entries.title: Civil lawsuit filed year after police-related death of Minneapolis man, Amir Locke
entries.description: Civil lawsuit filed year after police-related death of Minneapolis man, Amir Locke, who was killed during a no-knock search warrant.

entries.title: China balloon live updates: US tracking balloon as it flies across country
entries.description: The U.S. is tracking a balloon from China flying over the country.

entries.title: Ex-pop star Gary Glitter freed from UK prison
entries.description: Former pop star Gary Glitter has been released from prison in England after serving half of a 16-year prison sentence for sexually abusing three young girls in the 1970s

entries.title: UK man admits treason over crossbow plot against queen
entries.description: A man who was arrested in the grounds of Windsor Castle with a loaded crossbow has pleaded guilty to treason for planning to attack Queen Elizabeth II

entries.title: US added a strong 517,000 jobs in January despite Fed hikes
entries.description: America’s employers added a robust 517,000 jobs in January, a surprisingly strong gain in the face of the Federal Reserve’s aggressive drive to slow growth and tame inflation with higher interest rates

entries.title: WATCH:  3 people rescued after being found clinging to floating ice box in sea
entries.description: The three fishermen were found near a capsized vessel off the coast of Australia.

entries.title: Confidence in police practices drops to a new low: POLL
entries.description: The confidence Americans have in police training and their treatment of Black people have fallen to new lows, according to a new poll.

entries.title: Sorry, not sorry: Some Jan. 6 rioters change tune after apology
entries.description: Some Jan. 6 defendants who expressed remorse in court have backtracked.

entries.title: Cyclist dies after being hit by car and stabbed by driver, authorities say
entries.description: The victim -- identified as 58-year-old Michael John Mammone -- worked as an emergency room physician at Providence Mission Hospital in Laguna Beach, California.

entries.title: Along Ukraine-Belarus border, a war of nerves — and drones
entries.description: On the Belarusian border, Ukrainian units are using drones to monitor a long expanse of marsh and woodland for a possible surprise offensive from the north

entries.title: Coast Guard probes deaths of US citizens in Antarctic
entries.description: The U.S. Coast Guard is investigating several deaths of U.S. citizens on passenger vessels in Antarctic waters between Nov. 15 and Dec. 1, 2022.

entries.title: Cops searching for 3 missing rappers find 'multiple bodies'
entries.description: Authorities searching for three aspiring rappers who have been missing for nearly two weeks have found “multiple bodies” at a vacant Detroit-area apartment building

entries.title: WATCH:  Manta ray greets divers in unexpected encounter
entries.description: Divers in Bali had a "breathtaking" encounter when they were greeted by an unexpected visitor: a large manta ray.
